author: Khac Phu Nguyen
title: 1,000% Surge: Crypto Miner Bitmine Soars After $250M Ethereum Bet and Tom Lee Appointment
description: The stock explodes as Bitmine pivots to Ethereum and brings a Wall Street heavyweight on board
content: Shares of Bitmine Immersion Technologies (BMNR) have surged more than 1,000% following a bold three-part announcement that's ignited investor excitementand speculation. The company revealed a $250 miâ€¦ [+1562 chars]
